description:
Damn, was I ever excited for this!
Our first bareback three-way, with Dennis, Calvin, and Jordan!
But I think Dennis was even more excited than I was. He likes younger, muscular guys and he had a grin from ear to ear when he met Calvin and Jordan.
Calvin was really excited too.
"This is something different," he said. "I can't wait!"
I think Jordan was a little more nervous.
"It's been a while since I sucked a dick. I hope I do OK."
This film has a run time that is a little longer that unusual — 38 minutes. But there was so much awesome footage and some really fun behind-the-scenes stuff that we wanted to include as much of it as possible!
Dennis and Calvin take turns fucking Jordan. Dennis fucks Calvin. A three-way train with Calvin in the middle. And the best part... Dennis gets double stuffed!
"One... and two... in there!" he said, pointing to his hole.
All three of our guys were so much fun! They were all sweaty and laughing and having a great time.
And Dennis got what he wanted... although at the end he had cum all over his face, in his eye, all over his hole, and even a little inside!
title: Dennis, Calvin & Jordan: Bareback
